# Course

- Go to course menu showing course list page. There is default showing 10 rows.

<img src="../../admin/course-list.png" />

-	When we need to add course click Add course button. Now showing Add course page. 

<img src="../../admin/add-course.png" />

-	Enter valid course details and click submit button.

-	Once course created successfully return to course page. This created course showing in the list.

<img src="../../admin/course-list1.png" />

-	Anything actions needed in the Course list use action column edit icon and delete icon.
-	Edit icon use to update the course details.
-	Delete icon used to delete this course. 

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Course List**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "paginate": {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 10,
                "sort": {
                    "key": false,
                    "sortKey": "",
                    "sortType": true
                },
                "search": {
                    "key": false,
                    "searchKey": "all",
                    "searchValue": ""
                },
                "dateFilter": false,
                "institute": "all"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: CourseListRequest) {\n  getCourseList(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}  
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Create Course**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "body": {
                "instituteId": "652fbc52be58f3ae55b5a89d",
                "programId": "652fc49777d44ebded0d34c4",
                "courseName": "Electrical Engg",
                "courseCode": "DR145",
                "badgeId": "652fca8277d44ebded0d3674",
                "startDate": "2023-10-18",
                "endDate": "2023-11-18",
                "certificateType": "Lifetime Certificate",
                "certificateValidFrom": "10/18/2023",
                "certificateValidTo": "10/18/2023",
                "description": "<p>Lorium</p>",
                "gradeType": "CGPA",
                "conditions": "",
                "authorizedSignatories": [
                    {
                        "name": "Vellieswaran",
                        "designation": "Principal",
                        "authorizedId": "652fc7c877d44ebded0d3554",
                        "thumbFiles": [],
                        "signAttachment": [],
                        "signImageUrl": "https://crypken-bucket.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/development/signature/sign/5b890e3d-87dc-4723-adbc-f71814cfeb88"
                    }
                ],
                "status": 1,
                "numberOfDays": 1,
                "gradeTypeValue": "95"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: CreateCourseRequest) {\n  createCourse(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Get Course ById**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fce9277d44ebded0d3717"
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: GetCourseByIdRequest) {\n  getCourseById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Update Course**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fce9277d44ebded0d3717",
            "body": {
                "_id": "652fce9277d44ebded0d3717",
                "programId": "652fc49777d44ebded0d34c4",
                "instituteId": "652fbc52be58f3ae55b5a89d",
                "badgeId": "652fca8277d44ebded0d3674",
                "courseName": "Electrical Engg",
                "courseCode": "DR145",
                "startDate": "2023-10-18",
                "endDate": "2023-11-18",
                "numberOfDays": 1,
                "certificateType": "Lifetime Certificate",
                "certificateValidFrom": "10/18/2023",
                "certificateValidTo": "10/18/2023",
                "description": "<p>Lorium</p>",
                "gradeType": "CGPA",
                "gradeTypeValue": "95",
                "authorizedSignatories": [
                    {
                        "name": "Vellieswaran",
                        "designation": "Principal",
                        "authorizedId": "652fc7c877d44ebded0d3554",
                        "thumbFiles": [],
                        "signAttachment": [],
                        "signImageUrl": "https://crypken-bucket.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/development/signature/sign/5b890e3d-87dc-4723-adbc-f71814cfeb88"
                    }
                ],
                "createdBy": "652fb7953bb12d581a57b480",
                "status": 1,
                "createdAt": "2023-10-18T12:24:50.285Z",
                "updatedAt": "2023-10-18T12:24:50.285Z",
                "__v": 0,
                "program": [
                    {
                        "_id": "652fc49777d44ebded0d34c4",
                        "instituteId": "652fbc52be58f3ae55b5a89d",
                        "programName": "Digital Information",
                        "programCode": "001",
                        "duration": "One Month",
                        "createdBy": "652fb7953bb12d581a57b480",
                        "status": 1,
                        "createdAt": "2023-10-18T11:42:16.452Z",
                        "updatedAt": "2023-10-18T11:44:26.729Z",
                        "__v": 0
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: UpdateCourseRequest) {\n  updateCourse(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Delete Course**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "640adee5792e7f9a9148ad1f"
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: DeleteCourseByIdRequest) {\n  deleteCourseById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
}
```
</dl>
